actionable_tasks.title: Complete MongoDB TTL Indexes
actionable_tasks.description: Finish implementing MongoDB TTL indexes at 50% progress. Add TTL indexes for expiring temporary data like user sessions, chat histories, or logs to automatically clean up old records and improve performance.
implementation_steps: Identify collections needing TTL (e.g., sessions, temp chats) based on schema.
Use MongoDB Compass or mongo shell to create indexes: db.collection.createIndex({ "expiresAt": 1 }, { expireAfterSeconds: 3600 })
Update Mongoose schemas with { expires: '1h' } for relevant fields.
Test by inserting documents with future expiresAt and verify deletion after TTL.
Add index verification to quality check script in package.json.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Performance Monitoring to p50/p95 Tracking
actionable_tasks.description: Performance monitoring at 40% complete. Add p50 and p95 latency tracking for API endpoints using existing metrics setup to meet Q1 2026 target of <200ms p95.
implementation_steps: Install or use existing Prometheus client or StatsD for histograms.
Instrument key endpoints (e.g., /api/search, /api/spotify/playback) with request duration histograms.
Aggregate p50/p95 in dashboard queries (e.g., histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m]))).
Expose metrics endpoint if not present: GET /metrics.
Test with load (e.g., artillery) and verify percentiles in logs/Grafana.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Basic Jest Tests to Reach Incremental Test Coverage
actionable_tasks.description: Testing expansion needed to increase from ~45% to >70% coverage. Write 5-10 high-impact unit tests for MCP endpoints and provider health checks.
implementation_steps: Run `npm test -- --coverage` to identify low-coverage files (e.g., MCP, providers).
Write tests for provider health checks: mock failures, verify failover.
Test MCP endpoints: POST /api/mcp with valid/invalid payloads.
Add coverage thresholds to jest.config.js: { coverageThreshold: { global: { branches: 50 } } }.
Run coverage report and commit if >50% achieved.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement AI Transparency Badges in UI
actionable_tasks.description: AI Transparency & Labeling started (High priority). Add simple 'AI-Augmented' badges to recommendation results and chat responses for compliance.
implementation_steps: Define badge logic: if recommendation from LLM or ML, flag as 'AI-Augmented'.
Add AI-Augmented to relevant JSX components.
Style badge with CSS: yellow background, tooltip explaining source.
Pass aiFlag prop from backend API responses.
Test in chat and discovery UI.

actionable_tasks.title: Create Simple Dockerfiles for Dev Containerization
actionable_tasks.description: Docker optimization in medium priority. Add basic multi-stage Dockerfiles for Node backend and React frontend to enable local dev/prod parity.
implementation_steps: Backend: FROM node:20-alpine, COPY ., npm ci, npm run build, EXPOSE 3000.
Frontend: FROM node:20-alpine, npm ci, npm run build, serve -s build.
Add docker-compose.yml with services: backend, frontend, mongo.
Test: docker-compose up, verify app runs on localhost.
Optimize with .dockerignore for node_modules.
